name: WWII Squad Level Land Battles ssp
name_original: WWII Squad Level Land Battles ssp
description:
It is a Hard core Turn based Chit based wargame set in WW2, But quite easy to use, a simple left click to move or right click to attack.

The Chits Represent Small Arms , Squads and AFVs. you have Leaders that improve units they are near to. There is terrain effects modifiers, Leader Bonuses, Armor and Anti-Armor weapons. There is a good Line of sight system and walls so you can karal enemy units to say a building. the editor is great allows you to set everything and create victory points, on the main game screen I added copy and paste of units so modules are easy to create.

The big thing that shines in this game is a great A.I. and opfire. the userstuff folder you can add your own graphics for officers or tanks.
